Uses of Interface
com.bfo.netkeystore.server.KeyAuthorization

Packages that use KeyAuthorization
Package
Description
com.bfo.netkeystore.server
Contains the classes used by a NetKeyStore server

  • Uses of KeyAuthorization in com.bfo.netkeystore.server

    Classes in com.bfo.netkeystore.server that implement KeyAuthorization
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    SampleOnlineOTP
    A simple Online OTP KeyAuthorization which could be used as the basis for a useful implementation just by overriding the "notify" method.
    Fields in com.bfo.netkeystore.server declared as KeyAuthorization
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final KeyAuthorization
    KeyAuthorization.EXPLICIT
    The default "Explicit" KeyAuthorization that uses the password sent by the client to unlock the key
    static final KeyAuthorization
    KeyAuthorization.IMPLICIT
    An "Implicit" KeyAuthorization that uses the password set in the configuration file to unlock the key
    Methods in com.bfo.netkeystore.server that return KeyAuthorization
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    KeyAuthorization
    Server.getKeyAuthorization()
    Return the KeyAuthorization in use by this server, which never be null
